Package LimakWebApp

Class ServicesHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • LimakWebApp.ServicesHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Client, CommunicationServiceThreadHandler

    public abstract class ServicesHandler
extends java.lang.Object

    ServicesHandler

    This abstract class is base for server and client main communication classes
    Since:
    22.07.2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kamil Chrustowski

      This method terminates ExecutorServices, closes held sockets

      This method returns reference to hold controller

      This abstract method is a base of communication system invented in this web project - receives commands send usually from peer

      This abstract method is model, deriving classes can also put other functionality

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServicesHandler

        public ServicesHandler​(SocketHandler handler,
                       CredentialPacket packet,
                       java.lang.String ID)
                throws java.io.IOException
        This constructor sets basic fields of object and runs a runnable that perform sockets operations (access to streams)
        Parameters:
        handler - Object received from socket
        packet - credentials of local user
        ID - id of session
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if provided sockets in handler are null

      • rcvCmd

        protected abstract void rcvCmd​(MessageToSend command)
        This abstract method is a base of communication system invented in this web project - receives commands send usually from peer
        Parameters:
        command - the data package with several instructions

      • saveFile

        protected abstract void saveFile​(FilePacket filePacket)
        This abstract method is model, deriving classes can also put other functionality
        Parameters:
        filePacket - the data package to save on drive

      • sendListOfFiles

        protected abstract void sendListOfFiles​(java.util.Map.Entry<CredentialPacket,java.util.ArrayList<java.io.File>> data)
        This abstract method is model, deriving classes can also put other functionality
        Parameters:
        data - the entry of map that contains a user's credentials as a key and list of file names as a value
